rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --disable-nls \ --disable-silent-rules
# Touch all files in the dependency tree of bison.info to # inhibit makeinfo invocation in the build process. install -d doc/figs touch --date="2000-01-01" \ doc/bison.texi \ doc/*.texi \ doc/figs/example.txt \ doc/figs/example-reduce.txt \ doc/figs/example-shift.txt \ doc/bison.help \ build-aux/cross-options.pl \ src/getargs.c
# order is important, of course! touch doc/bison.info
